CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Caledonia Mining Corp PLC is a gold exploration, development, and mining company. The company's geographical segment includes Zimbabwe and South Africa. Its operations are into Blanket Gold Mine located in the south-west of Zimbabwe. The majority of revenue is generated from the Zimbabwe segment.
